sections.MISSION: TF Trident conducts PLT STX from 22NOV-09DEC 2023 on TA West IOT progress UAF combined arms maneuver across echelons.
sections.PURPOSE: this operation is to enable UAF to build capability through combined arms maneuver in preparation for Platoon Live Fire Exercises. .

Enabler Integration (sUAS, Engineers, Mortars)
Safe and efficient

of PLT STX

sections.END STATE:
UAF BTGs are prepared to execute combined arms maneuver and postured to conduct PLT and Company LFXs in preparation for Force on Force.
